critical_features.name: User Authentication & Authorization
critical_features.description: Laravel Sanctum token-based authentication with role-based access control
critical_features.impact: CRITICAL - Without this, no user can access the system

critical_features.name: Event Participation (User & Anonymous)
critical_features.description: Users and anonymous participants can join and complete events/activities
critical_features.impact: CRITICAL - Core functionality for data collection

critical_features.name: Response Saving (Question & Option Level)
critical_features.description: Individual responses saved with full question and option tracking
critical_features.impact: CRITICAL - Data loss if not working

critical_features.name: Notification Lifecycle Tracking
critical_features.description: Complete tracking of notifications: sent → delivered → opened → read
critical_features.impact: CRITICAL - Required for engagement metrics and compliance

critical_features.name: Reports & Analytics
critical_features.description: Comprehensive reporting system with real-time analytics
critical_features.impact: CRITICAL - Business intelligence and decision making

critical_features.name: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
critical_features.description: Six roles with granular permissions: super-admin, admin, program-admin, program-manager, program-moderator, participant

critical_features.name: Data Audit Logging
critical_features.description: Response audit logs and notification logs for compliance

critical_features.name: S3 Image Upload & Storage
critical_features.description: AWS S3 integration for secure image storage with presigned URLs

critical_features.name: Email Campaign System
critical_features.description: SendGrid integration with tracking and reporting

critical_features.name: Data Safety Settings
critical_features.description: Configurable backup, retention, and logging policies

non_critical_features.name: Landing Page CMS
non_critical_features.description: Content management for public-facing landing pages
non_critical_features.impact: LOW - Marketing feature, doesn't affect core functionality

non_critical_features.name: Contact Forms
non_critical_features.description: Demo requests, contact sales, and general contact forms
non_critical_features.impact: LOW - Lead generation, not critical for existing users

notes: This list MUST be updated before any major release. All critical features MUST pass pre-deployment tests.
